sources.title: Big Timber (1950)
sources.description: Roddy Mc Dowall, Robert Shayne, Ted Hecht, Lyle Talbot

metadata.Plot: A young man goes to work in a logging camp to fulfill a boyhood ambition and a jealous loggers rigs things to make him appear to be an incompetent bungler. But he proves himself successfully conveying an injured workman to the hospital in a careening truck, whose brakes have been tampered with, down a mountainside.
metadata.Actors: Roddy McDowall, Jeff Donnell, Lyn Thomas
